publishedfiledetails.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/dFJ5C6A.png[/img]

[code][h1]Note: Before making a bug report test the mod in Singleplayer or a locally hosted server!
If it works there but not on your dedicated server, then the problem is that the mod is not fully installed on the server.
If this is the case I cannot help you, the underlying issues are with the steam infrastructure (specifically their installer, "steamcmd").
You can solve this problem by trying to install the mod again, and if that does not work by manually uploading your local mod files to the server.

I am unhappy with this situation myself and contacted Valve about this, as have other modders and even Studio Wildcard, but as of now there is no solution from their side.[/h1][/code]


[h1]MRRadToolsINC is a content mod that adds various new items to ARK. New building parts, new weapons as well as decorative pieces for your base. [/h1]

[url=http://mrradtools.net/][img]http://i.imgur.com/9rS4Ivw.png[/img][/url][url=http://mrradtools.net/compendium][img]http://i.imgur.com/3BME13h.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://mrradtools.net/ini-settings][img]http://i.imgur.com/HknFgFu.png[/img][/url][url=https://twitter.com/mrradtoolsinc][img]http://i.imgur.com/8d1MKLn.png[/img][/url]

[h1]Mod ID: 497432858[/h1]

[h1]Please report all bugs, also give feedback - thanks[/h1] 

[h1]CURRENT VERSION: 6.7.1[/h1]
[code]
#HOTFIX FOR THE GAUSS SERVER PROBLEM! (6.7.1)

#Modsize is now ~ 600 MB
#ReMesh of the CDW Walls with barbwire (dont touch it!) 
#ReMesh of the Sofa Set
#ReMesh of the Bed (stage 1)
#ReMesh of the first Content Pack 
#Better Snapping Points for the CDWs 
#Holosight "Glass" is now more transparent
#CDW Wall have now Snappings for Ceilings and Foundations
#Painting and Coloring of the most Structures work now 
#Better Shared Materials System 
#Content Pack 3 Deco is now available! 
#add Snappoints (for ceilings) to the gates
#New "Secret" Structure: cheat giveitem "Blueprint'/Game/Mods/MRRadTools/Content_pack_3/Blueprints/PrimalItemStructure_ConPack3_DefWire01.PrimalItemStructure_ConPack3_DefWire01'
" 1 0 0
#smaller fixes 
#new Icons for the CDWs 

Knowing Bugs: (unfixable current) 
#Gates cant be foundations - need a snapped CDW Wall - important if you want to use the gate ceiling snappings. *
#Gate Painting is also buggy. *
#Current there is no fix / no idea why that happens. (*) Maybe its a problem how the Gates work. 
#Painting over Screws&Co make strange paintings - avoid to paint over it!
[/code]
